Key Match Events: Charlie Blackmon hit his 227th career home run, tying Carlos Gonzalez for fifth in franchise history; he also had three RBIs, his highest in a game since May 27
Post-Match Reflections: Charlie Blackmon expressed his enjoyment of the final season and the unpredictability of games at Coors Field
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was significant for Charlie Blackmon's final season with the Rockies
